mapper.insert: insert into EmpInfo (empName, empSex, empEmail, depName) values (#{empName},#{empSex},#{empEmail},#{depName})
mapper.update: update EmpInfo set empName=#{empName}, empSex=#{empSex}, empEmail={empEmail},depName=#{depName} where empNum=#{empNum}
mapper.select: select * from EmpInfo where empNum > 0 order by empNum desc
